content: I think I'll create a combination of clues, riddles, and rhymes to make the Sparkly Treasure Hunt game more exciting and challenging for the kids. Thanks for the examples and ideas! I'll make sure to adjust the difficulty level according to the age and skill level of the kids playing the game. One more question, can I use the sparkly shoes and t-shirt I got for my niece as part of the treasure hunt clues or prizes?
